name: Save the Town!
description:
It’s time to rescue your beloved town and its citizens! Will you be up for the challenge?



Jump at the back of your truck, get rid of all the enemies along the way and save Sara, Rose, Bob and many more! But you won’t be able to save everyone so you will have to make difficult decisions... Are you prepared for that ? There is only one way to find out!



Here is a list the features of your new free casual game:

- Beautiful 3D graphics
- Many fun characters and skins to unlock along the way
- 100% free game
- Fun and addictive gameplay
- Easy controls
- For kids and adults
- Many worlds to be discovered



Best of luck in this life changing free adventure game! And remember, everyone counts on you so do not disappoint. Many lives are in your hands now…
